about_the_game:
Embark on an epic intergalactic adventure in this space faring Metroidvania! Irata, a skilled bounty hunter and unlikely hero, is tasked with saving the solar system from a menacing federation of hostile species. With your blaster and a thirst for adventure, explore three diverse planets filled with bounties, upgrades, civilizations, hidden secrets, and dangers.

Eons ago, the Eternium core, an advanced chipset with the power to link all intelligent systems, was created in a last-ditch attempt to ward off the first coup of power organized by the Federation. Moments before defeat, the planetary alliance activated the Divine Architect, a sentient artificial intelligence that was designed to control the Eternium core.

The war was won but, in its wake, left a thirst for power. It was no longer just the federation that wanted control. Insiders within the planetary alliance from all corners of the solar system tried their hands at gaining control.

It was then, that the leaders of the 3 planets agreed to give the Eternium core its last instructions, to separate in 6 and have its pieces be spread equally across the planets.

Peace was restored. The legend of the Eternium Core faded to myth. And the Divine Architect laid dormant. Until now.

Our protagonist is one of the many space bounty hunters domiciled on planet metropolis. During the first insurrection, the bounty hunters of planet Metropolis were all too eager to help the cause and fight the federation. However, today’s bounty hunters have been born into a world of self preservation. A trait that our reluctant hero will battle with.

You will chart your own course… Will you help civilians along the way? Or will you focus on what pays the most? Some seemingly helpless civilians may be worth more than the credits they can provide. Only you will be able to decide the best course of action.

Will you focus on purchasing what you need from your home planet, or will you conjure a more natural path to acquire what you need on planet Verdanterra?

Explore a Solar System teeming with wonder and danger, where each planet holds secrets waiting to be uncovered:

1. Thermaridia:

- Descend into the molten heart of Thermaridia, where lava caverns stretch like fiery veins beneath the surface. Beware the searing heat and unpredictable geysers as you seek ancient relics hidden within the liquid rock.

2. Verdanterra:

Inhale the sweet scent of Verdanterra’s lush forests, where towering trees intertwine like ancient storytellers. Atop the trees and below the surface you will find civilizations in worlds of their own. Here, life thrives in harmony. At least it use to…

3. Metropolis:

Amid the dystopian cityscapes of Metropolis, neon signs flicker above crowded streets and Hovercars hum between skyscrapers. This is where you will be able to purchase most of what you need, but remember, credits are in short supply. Navigate the urban maze that is Irata’s home planet.

Your starship awaits—its engines humming with potential. Assemble your crew, upgrade your vessel, and chart your course. The Solar system is vast, and your choices shape its destiny.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: The system requirements will change as the game moves further into development.

short_description: Irata, a space bounty hunter is caught in a galactic conflict. A rogue federation seeks the fragments of the Eternium Core, an advanced chip that commands all defense systems in the solar system. In this sci-fi Metroidvania, explore, fight, and upgrade your way to stop the enemy and save the galaxy.
